topic: Skills-First Signals: Micro-credentials, Open Badges and CLR in Hiring
target_audience: career services, employers, registrars, platform product teams

refs.content: Analyzes comparability of skills evidence across sectors and countries; implications for signalling and labor-market outcomes.
Defines policy frameworks and QA for micro-credentials; portability and stacking toward larger qualifications.
Aligns with W3C VC v2; supports defined achievement and skill claims; interoperable with CLR and verifiable presentations.

special_instructions: Explain employer verification flow; show examples of skills statements and alignment to frameworks (ESCO/ONET).
